channel.title: Blogs on Topsham Charter Day
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Topsham Charter Day

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello! This is a test and should be deleted lol

item.title: Whats Happening in 2019?
item.description: On the 24th August we will be celebrating changes in Topsham between World War One and World War Two, but our emphasis on Charter Day will be letting our hair down in the 1920s!

item.title: Topsham Charter Day 2018
item.description: On the 25th August 2018, on charter day we remembered the 100 year anniversary of the ending of World War One.

item.title: Topsham Charter Day 2017
item.description: On the 26th August 2017 the Charter Day Theme was Boats, Pilgrims and Pirates.

item.title: Topsham Charter Day 2016
item.description: In 2016 Topsham returned to Medieval times as the Charter was carried through the town.
